unnormalised: My neighbour, Mrs. Sharma, was diagnosed with dengue after returning from her trip to Kerala. Dr. Rao prescribed her complete bed rest and plenty of fluids, like coconut water, every 4 hrs.
normalised: My neighbour, Missus Sharma, was diagnosed with dengue after returning from her trip to Kerala. Doctor Rao prescribed her complete bed rest and plenty of fluids, like coconut water, every four hours.
